settings.label: ${entityName}
settings.tooltipFunction:
let {entityName, alarmsCount, address, city, zonesCount, assignedAssetsCount, country} = data; function returnZeroIfFalsy(variable) { return variable ? variable : 0; } alarmsCount = returnZeroIfFalsy(alarmsCount); zonesCount = returnZeroIfFalsy(zonesCount); assignedAssetsCount = returnZeroIfFalsy(assignedAssetsCount); return `
${entityName}
Address
${address}
City
${city}
Country
${country}
Zones
${zonesCount}
Assets
${assignedAssetsCount}
Details
`; // style="text-align: center;font-size: 18px;font-weight: 500;color: #026AA2;text-decoration: none;line-height: 28px;border-bottom: 0;"

tooltipAction.name: go-to-location

settings.markdownTextFunction:
const widgetData = data[0]; const entityName = widgetData.entityName; let addressParts = [ String(widgetData.address), String(widgetData.city), String(widgetData.country) ]; let address = addressParts.filter(part => part && part.trim()).join(', ') ? addressParts.filter(part => part && part.trim()).join(', ') : "No address"; return `
Locations / ${entityName}
${entityName}
${address}
`;

settings.label: ${entityName}
settings.tooltipFunction:
let {entityName, criticalAlarmsCount, minorAlamrsCount, address, city, zonesCount, assignedAssets} = data; function returnZeroIfFalsy(variable) { return variable ? variable : 0; } criticalAlarmsCount = returnZeroIfFalsy(criticalAlarmsCount); minorAlamrsCount = returnZeroIfFalsy(minorAlamrsCount); zonesCount = returnZeroIfFalsy(zonesCount); let assetsCount; try { const assets = JSON.parse(assignedAssets); assetsCount = assets.length; } catch(e) { assetsCount = 0; } return `
${entityName}
Alerts
${criticalAlarmsCount} critical
${minorAlamrsCount} minor
Address
${address}
City
${city}
Zones
${zonesCount}
Assets
${assetsCount}
Details
`;
